hero.lead: Holding registered in the USA. Corporate structure, clear governance, and absolute focus on execution and the long term.

who.title: Who We Are
paragraphs: MoonRise Holdings LLC is a technology and financial company. Our mission is to build real infrastructure with process, security, and scale.
We operate with international standards, defined internal controls, and objective communication. No promises. Just delivery.

purpose.title: Our Purpose
items: Develop critical technology for modern financial operations.
Standardize processes, reduce risk, and increase execution speed.
Connect partners and investors to a serious and auditable operation.

experience.title: Our Experience
items: System architecture and auditable contracts, focused on security.
Lean corporate operation, clear processes, and data-driven decisions.
Continuous delivery: planning, versioning, measuring, and improving.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.summary: Institutional support, partnerships or questions? Get in touch with our team.

modal.title: Felipe Araújo — Founder & CEO
modal.body:
I am Felipe Araújo, a Brazilian entrepreneur and founder of MoonRise Technologies. My career in the market began years ago, working in areas such as technology, programming, digital marketing, and business management. These experiences gave me the practical vision of how companies grow, where they fail, and which foundations truly sustain long-term results.

I have always believed that discipline, transparency, and consistency are non-negotiable principles. There are no shortcuts: only process, daily execution, and personal responsibility in every decision. This mindset brought me here and is the foundation of how I lead.

Throughout my journey, I witnessed a recurring problem both in the traditional market and in the crypto world: lack of transparency, empty promises, and projects born without a solid base, leaving investors at a loss. This scenario deeply bothered me. That’s exactly why I decided to found MoonRise: to prove that it is possible to build a transparent, serious, and long-term financial ecosystem.

From the beginning, I made a clear decision: deliver before selling. Even before the presale, we were already developing our application, MoonWallet, and structuring the company’s transparency base. We did this with our own resources, because I believe it only makes sense to ask for someone’s trust when there is already real execution.

Another strategic choice was regarding the supply. Out of the 8 billion tokens active after the initial burn, my personal allocation is only 20 million (0.25%), all locked for 12 months in a public contract. This shows that I am not seeking individual advantage and that I am not a whale capable of crashing the market price. My success, like that of any investor, depends exclusively on the sustainable growth of MoonRise.

My vision is clear: I am not here to get rich by dumping tokens, but to build a company that generates real, solid, and sustainable revenues. I believe this is the only way to create true value — when both the company and investors grow together.

MoonRise was not born to speculate. It was born to govern, execute, and bring confidence to a discredited market. This is the commitment I assume as founder: to lead by example, maintain discipline, and build something that stands the test of time.
